thread.title: gary keith
thread.title_full: Otticanet recensione scritta da gary keith

author: gary keith
title: gary keith
text: I loved everything about my dealings with Otticanet,. I'm going to give them the benefit of the doubt on my one small quibble. I bought "the last in stock" then when back to the site to see what else they had. My sunglasses were back in stock (with no "back in stock!" notation), then several days later a last in stock note. This all could have been legitimate restocks, but, knowing that psychological games can be played, I wish they said "back in stock" or "contact if restocked" just to show they weren't playing on one's availability fears.
